mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.username, u.password, u.enabled FROM users u WHERE u.username = #{username}
SELECT r.role_name FROM roles r INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT p.permission_name FROM permissions p INNER JOIN role_permissions rp ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
